description: This could be a great app. *But* though it finds lots of files in many folders it also misses a lot of files of the same type (PDF, rtf, txt, odt). And there is no way to feed the app with these missing files. The developers obviously didn't want the user to interfere - but such a restriction is only acceptable, if the program works automatically without hefty flaws.

I hate to give a bad review to a GNOME app, but as much as I've tried to use it, it's just too difficult. Your documents are presented non-hierarchically, which is supposed to make them easy to find, but in practice it's just an intimidating mess of different documents from all over my filesystem and Google accounts. Two stars because it is pretty sleek, though.
Has potential but so far an unrealized potentials.
When I launch gnome documents, CPU usage goes up to 100% and stays there for seemingly forever, while the user is given no feedback about what is going on.
Simple yet amazing.
10/10 would recommend
Currently running Fedora 28 with vanilla GNOME outside of a few GNOME extensions. While I love GNOME, this app has never worked. All the app seems to do is load continuously.
I have never had the opportunity to proper use this application, due to its background task taking all my memory and CPU. Maybe I'll try again in the future.
summary: High CPU and memory usage is not a elegant way to do anything

description:
this thing is pretty buggy overall and doesn't have any serious functionality.

But it can consume 3 gigs of RAM sometimes and 90 percent of CPU. I'd file a bug but the application is so useless that why bother?

I have a school microsoft account which i sync all my school work files too however i cant edit them on here as you have to sign in to the office 365 login rather than the standard microsoft login which it doesn't allow me to do if this was fixed i would give 5 stars

I think the original idea behind gnome-documents made sense, but for years now, no development seems to have been happening. The programme is extremely slow, when you launch it, it say for hours that it is getting documents from the online accounts, it hogs the CPU, but you never seem to be getting any result. And this repeats itself every single time, as if now caching was taking place at all.
summary: Extremely slow, very basic functionality. No improvements in years

description: Every time I search some pdf files I accidentally open them with this app instead of the much nicer "Document Viewer". Since Gnome have no ways to customize what to show in search results, I have to remove this app.
Reat the title ...

The app is not used by many people, supports a lot of documents, but Microsoft cloud support not working very well, .tex documents are not working without evince package which needs to be installed separatelly.
One does not simply use gnome-documents, use evince instead.

It's like a file explorer just puked every document into one window. I left it on my system at first and thought that maybe there was some use for it and I'd give it a shot, but after a while I just have to admit that it's completely useless and should have never been on there in the first place.
Sorry, I don't have time to detailed review, but at current state it's hardly usable

Um app que reune todos o documentos.
Estou usando no Debian Bullseye com gnome e, simplesmente amei.
works well to open PDF's
Gosh, wow,if you want to loose time, use this!
Documents have fixed some issues that the bad reviews stated. It's gotten a lot better, and GNOME integration is awesome.
summary: Get's hate that it doesn't deserve

description: This froze while downloading documents. I have about 4 docs in my Google Drive and it froze downloading about 600kb on a decently specs laptop.

All my google docs in one place. I can view and open it with google docs for editing. Highly recommended. Working flawlessly on ubuntu 20.04. I think it can pull the onedrive documents, not sure, though. Thank you so much developers.
i love how sync and organizate my gsuito document.
I don't see what the point really is
The application just doesn't list any documents of any sort either locally or not

I am on Debian 11 Stable. I don't use it, at least not that I know of, but it frequently kicks in and eats tons of CPU resources. Extremely resource intensive. It is supposed to be able to let you search for certain words in documents, but I have not had any luck being able to get it to do that
summary: resource intense, doesn't seem to search within document content

description: I'd never used it before. Tried to open it for the first time, and the system froze. I learned my lesson.
It has no real features that souk or the document viewer does not have
Excellent for me
Das Programm ist im momentanen Zustand nicht zu gebrauchen. Die einfachsten Funktionen funktionieren nicht, die Hilfe stimmt nicht mit dem Programm überein.

Man sieht schon in der Info: das Copyright ist im Jahr 2014 stehen geblieben. Das Programm ist von der Idee genial (alle Dokumente an einem zentralen Platz), aber bedauerlicherweise lausig umgesetzt. In den System-logs stehen lauter core-dumps. Dringend nachbessern!

Wenn man das Programm startet orgelt es stundenlang rum, "Hole Dokumente von Online-Konten", wird aber nie fertig. Dokumente scheinen in zufälliger Weise präsentiert zu werden. Nicht klar was es soll.
Leider kann ich keine Dokumente gruppieren, alle Schaltflächen sind ausgegraut. Nette Idee, aber funktioniert noch nicht.

This programm was broken for me too, but after the last update it works well on my machine. Sure it has a litte lack of features but for me it is very usefull to find what I'm looking for in my messy Dokuments-Folder.
summary: Works good if you just want to look quickly for a file or Presentation

description:
Das Programm hat eine so schlechte Kritik, dass ich es entfernen wollte. Aber dazu kam ich nicht, denn es gibt keine Möglichkeit, es zu entfernen.

Eigenartig
very*cause_very
Es dauert ca. 5 bis 10 Sekunden, bis der "Beschäftigt-Mauszeiger" wieder verschwindet. Ein Programmfenster von "Dokumente" öffnet sich nicht. Nicht zu gebrauchen. :(
Ich finde diese Anwendung im Grunde perfekt für die übersichtliche Dokumentensuche.
summary: Ganz gut zur Verwaltung und Dkumentensuche

description: Sehr fehlerhaft, Text-Dokumente sind ca. 1-2 Jahre alt. Vielleicht ist die neuere Software nicht mehr kompatibel!
no tengo ninguna, directamente no lo use.

Como visor de documentos, no esta mal, pero a la a la hora de crear colecciones., falla... 
Esta aplicación, es una buena idea, pero mal ejecutada.
Una pena.
Lo irónico es que es una app hecha por el equipo de Gnome, pero en fedora 34 con gnome 4 no funciona. Ojo ahí
Application lente et peu ergonomique pour une utilisation quotidienne et surtout professionnelle.
Je ne vois pas l'utilité de cette appliccation.

La lecture des pdf est un plaisir (mode nuit, signets, barre de progression claire, ...) mais quelques détails comme l'accès au zoom et l'impossibilité de lancer 2 instances en parallèle (donc, d'ouvrir 2 documents côte-à-côte) sont gênants et empêchent cette application d'être réellement utilisable au quotidien.

Ceci dit, la promesse de la description de l'application est respectée à la lettre : c'est un moyen de parcourir, organiser et ouvrir ses documents sans perdre son temps dans l'arborescence de Nautilus, et en cas de besoin la possibilité d'ouvrir le fichier dans lecteur de pdf par défaut est toujours facile d'accès depuis l'application.
Ça ne fait rien de plus que d'essayer d'imiter les liseuses style Kindle ou Fnac Kobo mais sans être capable de lire les ebooks. Même pas les formats ouverts (ePub par ex.) des ebooks.
malheureusement l'upgrade de Jessie a Buster fait que sa marche pas enfin pour moi
summary: c'est jolie quand sa marche et pratique

description: On le supprime dès la fin de l'installation de GNOME..

Ce programme est très bien fait et simple d'utilisation. Permet une bonne visualisation des documents présent sur votre système, de les organiser, etc...
On est un peu dérouté au début, après s'être adapté on constate le potentiel de cette application.
Merci aux programmeurs !
Ne fonctionne pas sous kubuntu

J'étais venu pour le tester, tout marchait bien et ensuite j'ai connecté mes comptes pour récupérer mes documents sur le logiciels et c'est à partir de là que ça ne fonctionne plus, changement en cours trop long, je n'arrive pas à voir le tutoriel pour apprendre dessus, c'est impossible de l'ouvrir, autant d'aller sur Google Drive pour accéder à ses documents.
bon ameliorer de plus
Bien. Rempli un vide sous GNOME
неудобное, медленнее чем "просмотр документов", бывший evince, лезет в сеть.
usefull and correcktly
好好测试一下再发布吧，期待功能再完善。
summary: 不能发现文档，不能打开文档，不能关联文档
